spaceshooter.dom

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceshooter.dom.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends Object
    This class is used to create instances of projectiles. Firerate affects the rate at which this object can spawn proctiles. Damage is the damage given to spawned projectiles
